about_the_game:
Fly like a bird and experience a diverse and vibrant world full of possibilities. “Bird Go Sky” is a peaceful, relaxed and friendly game where you embody a bird, gliding through the air, gathering food, collecting materials, building your nest and engaging in many other cool and cute bird activities.

The game is not finished yet. Features and planned content may change before release.

Bird Stuff – Gameplay

🪽 Fly around and discover the world from bird's eye perspective
Flap your wings and glide over an expansive map filled with details. Explore diverse environments with unique places in every corner.

🪺 Build your nest and hatch your egg
Gather various materials to create a cozy nest. Lay eggs, nurture them, and help them hatch safely.

🪱 Be early to catch the worm and other food
Stay nourished by seeking out a variety of food sources. Ensure you never go hungry as you explore.

🪿 Unlock and play as multiple species and variations of birds
Hatching your eggs unlocks new species to play with and different appearances for your birds.

👥 Play together with your friends
Join forces with friends using the game's online features and experience the joy of flying together.

Flock Together – Online Multiplayer

♥️ Make new friends
Use chirps to communicate and connect with fellow birds.

🗺️ Explore together
Call out to locate each other and embark on joint explorations.

🤝 Help each other
Collaborate in gathering food and materials, ensuring everyone thrives.

🎶 Sing with your flock
Orchestrate beautiful bird songs together with your friends.

---

Release

ℹ️ There is no specific release date so far, as many features are still unfinished and optimization for performance and usability can take a lot of time.
✅ If you like the game so far, please add it to your wishlist so you get notified when it releases and check out this page occasionally to stay up to date! You can also follow Bird Go Sky on various social media!
🗨️You're welcome to share ideas and give feedback on discord!

Credits

This game would not have been possible without the great tools and content provided by:

Synty Studios – Level Design
Pulsar Bytes – Character Design
Mirror, FizzySteamworks – Network Technology
Boxophobic – VFX
Jessie Cherry, Lesfm, Olexy – Soundtrack
Various Creators – SFX

name: Bird Go Sky

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7-8550U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce MX150
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Might change in future versions
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A relaxed and friendly bird simulation game with co-op multiplayer. Fly around like a bird, build your nest and enjoy diverse environments filled with beautiful locations. Experience bird life and explore together with your friends.
